metadata.title: USN-5632-1 -- OAuthLib vulnerability
metadata.description: Sebastian Chnelik discovered that OAuthLib incorrectly handled certain redirect uris. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause OAuthLib to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5632-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-oauthlib - 3.2.0-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
